name: Community Center Park
description: Come play pickleball at Community Center Park in Mammoth Lakes, CA! There are 2 outdoor asphalt courts. The lines are overlaid on a tennis court, so the net is a little taller than a normal pickleball net. The courts are free. Reservations are not available.

name: Mammoth Creek Park
description: Mammoth Creek Park is a place to play pickleball in Mammoth Lakes, CA. There is 1 outdoor hard court. The lines are overlaid on a tennis court, so the net is a little taller than a normal pickleball net. The court cannot be reserved. The court is free.

name: Mammoth Lakes Pickleball Complex
description: Courts and equipment (paddles and balls) are available on a first-come, first-serve basis. For more information, please contact the Parks and Recreation Department on (760) 965-3690.
open_play_schedule: It is open seven (7) days a week, 8:00am-8:00pm, from April to November (weather dependent).

name: Snowcreek Athletic Club
description: Come play pickleball at Snowcreek Athletic Club in Mammoth Lakes, CA! There are 4 hard courts. 2 are outdoors and 2 are indoors. The lines are permanent, and portable nets are available. A membership is required to play. Reservations are available. The facility includes amenities like restrooms, water, and lights.

name: Walker Community Park
description: Walker Community Park is a place to play pickleball in Coleville, CA. There is 1 outdoor hard court. The lines are overlaid on a tennis court, so the net is a little taller than a normal pickleball net. The court is free. The facility includes amenities like restrooms and water.
